thread.title: New York Unveils Climate Change Plans
thread.title_full: New York Unveils Climate Change Plans - WSJ

author: Erica Orden
title: New York Unveils Climate Change Plans
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo hasn’t always earned the praise of his fellow Democrats on issues central to the party, but on Thursday he added his voice to one of its core concerns—climate change.
Appearing alongside former Vice President Al Gore, a Democrat, at an event at Columbia University, the governor said the state would take several major steps to combat climate change and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. He called the measures... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
